transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Hanji
Customer: Ranjit sir baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Nahi sir main Shubham baat kar raha hun uska manager please bataiye sir.
Customer: Ranjit sir se baat karni thi thoda sa ek minute zara dijiye.
Executive: Kaunsi company se baat kar rahe hain sir Yashoda Arts se baat kar rahe hain kya?
Customer: Nahi Radha Krishna Arts.
Executive: Hanji sir Pravesh ji bataiye.
Customer: Hanji sir.
Customer: Maine WhatsApp kiya unko ek baar bolo dekhe ek client unhone dhund ke diye the.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Bole unhone bola ki sir aap aisa hai aap abhi temp block woh lagaye temp block lagaye isliye aap ho sakta hai yeh response nahi karenge toh back date mein chaunga theek hai back date mein chala jaata hun.
Customer: 10 tarikh ko maine plant se dhunde unse khud se call karwaye do plant ko toh phone nahi uthe ek ka utha unhone bola mujhe ₹5000 piece chahiye.
Customer: Toh bole sir aap inse baat karo maine kaha mere plant kisne kisne toh baat ki hogi staff ne ki hogi toh maine kaha mere bhai ne ki kisne kisne toh ki hogi.
Customer: Toh mere isme staff hai Shweta mam unse baat hui hai party ki unko jo bottle chahiye uska bakayda maine WhatsApp pe woh bheja hai unhe ki ek baar dekh lijiyega WhatsApp pe unki baat hui 10 November ki client hai 10 November ko hi baat hui hai.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
Customer: Ab unhone unko kya unse meri bhi baat karaiye mujhe abhi yaad aa gaya Shweta mam ne unko chahiye ₹4.5 ki bottle jo manufacturing price nahi hai.
Customer: ₹4.75 ki bottle main kharid raha hun ek piece ka cap laga raha hun ₹5.95 paise ki bottle pad rahi hai ₹6 piece ki rate di hai maine.
Customer: 5000 bottle mein ek mota mota samjhe point 35 paise main kama raha hun 35 paise mein ₹1750 mile mere ko.
Customer: ₹250 ready bhada lag gaya mere ko ₹1500 mile isme ₹350 mein valid mein kharch kar chuka hun mere ko ₹1150 mile.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Par mile kab jab deal hoti tab.
Customer: Client ka kehna ₹4.5 ki bhejte hai de do main check de sakta hun.
Executive: Sir woh toh
Executive: Main ek baar Ranjit sir se aapki baat kara deta hun sir woh bilkul aapki baat theek hai woh aapka price aapki saari cheeze woh aap janiye sir woh toh main toh usme kya hi kar sakta hun.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi sir yeh galat baat hai agar agar koi customer agar aake IndiaMART ka plan kharide sir tumhara ₹1.5 lakh ka main ₹55000 mein lunga kya aap usse client samjhenge yeh samjhenge mazak kar raha hai woh.
Executive: Bilkul sir.
Executive: But woh bhi sir agar koi yeh bolega ₹1.5 lakh ka ₹50000 mein toh woh toh possible hi nahi hota hai sir.
Customer: Mazak hai na woh woh mazak hi toh kar raha hai aapke saath.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Toh aise hi client yeh hai usko ₹4.5 mein chahiye toh yeh mazak nahi hai toh kya hai sir client ho hi nahi sakta kabhi zindagi mein.
Customer: Ek baar please meri baat kara dijiye Ranjit sir se unhone koi sun nahi kiya unhone dusri.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir woh jaise hi free hota hai Pravesh ji main aapko bata deta hun lekin matlab main ek baar yeh sikwa leta hun jaise aapne bheja hai jo bhi data bheja hai main bhi ek baar check kara leta hun lekin sir is.
Customer: Please main customer ka naam bhi bata deta hun Sriyansh ji hain.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan detail de dunga unki waise WhatsApp pe main bhej chuka hun.
Executive: Sir main samajh gaya lekin achha ek cheez bataiye sir itne time se jude hue hain ki aaj tak business hi nahi mila IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Sach mein nahi mila really na do mahine mein jo paisa mila invest hua mere ko utna paisa nahi nikal paya aur kya bolunga.
Executive: Sir do hi mahine mein.
Customer: Aaj 18 tarikh kal ho jayegi 18 tarikh ko mere ko 60 din ho jayenge 60 din mein mere ko 1384 yani ki ₹13000 ka jo maine yeh loss mein hun main ₹84000 ka matlab mere ₹5000 business hi nahi mila hai.
Executive: Sir sir aap aapke service sir aa rahe hain sir kya hai do mahine mein judge kar rahe hain service toh aapne saal bhar ke liye hai sir saal bhar mein business aayega hi sir.
Customer: Are sir aisa thodi hota hai ke beta shaadi kar le aaj roti nahi kar rahi toh kal degi kal bhag gayi toh kya warranty hai uski main transparent baat bolta hun buri lage aapko.
Customer: Aaj niwale nahi roti de aaj tu kar de karwa de kal tere ko khud kama ke degi kya matlab hai yaar uska ki main mar jaunga kar kar ke uske baad kama ke degi kya matlab hai.
Executive: Sir kama ke dene wali baat nahi hai aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye aap internet nahi nahi nahi nahi aap suniye Pravesh ji aap internet world mein baat kar rahe hain sir internet things hai time leti hai aisa nahi hai sir aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye aap kisi aap kisi shopping mall mein dukan kholte hain aapko dukan jo hai.
Customer: Suniye suniye suniye suniye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Meri Ranjit ji se deal hui.
Executive: Sir aap plan lijiyega main aapka support karunga koi issue aayega main baitha hun.
Customer: Main guarantee deta hun main aapko ₹5000 ₹5 lakh aapka within six month mein nikal ke dunga.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur aap khud mere se bolenge Pravesh ji ki aap mera yeh ₹5 lakh wala ₹10 lakh mein convert kar do 6 mahine baad.
Customer: Unhone aisa bola.
Customer: Main ₹10 lakh toh chhodo main ₹2000 mein bhi plan lunga yeh wala.
Executive: Rare rare case mein baat ho sakti hai mujhe baat karni padegi.
Customer: Nahi main kyun main aise anavashyak se kharcha karunga is plan ke upar jahan jahan se mujhe ₹2000 ka business nahi mila hai do mahine mein.
Customer: Main apne training ka data bhej du bolo statement bhej du aapko.
Executive: Sir hume mat bhejiye statement.
Customer: Kis ko bhejunga aap nahi sunenge toh kaun sunega 9696 ko bhej du kya.
Executive: Sir use bhi mat bhejiye aap issue bataiye aapne mere ko bata diya main toh bol hi raha hun ki ek baar jo aapne data bheja hai validate kar lete hain lekin sir IndiaMART.
Customer: Aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi bahut kam aa rahi hai matlab mere ko sun haan ab aa rahi hai.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai sir hello.
Customer: Bilkul aa rahi hai ekdam adjust perfect aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main yeh keh raha hun sir as an IndiaMART hum log sir hamara ROI hai aap tak buyer pahunchana we are a marketplace jo aapko buyers milate hain buyers aap tak aane chahiye hum yeh ensure karte hain.
Customer: Sir hum buyer aapke through aana chahiye deal karne wala sir.
Executive: Are dekho kya hota hai genuine cheeze genuine hoti hai buyer bhi toh woh aana chahiye deal karne wala.
Customer: Sir aur log bhi toh market mein baithe hain woh kaise phir business le rahe hain agar sir IndiaMART genuine kaam hi nahi kar raha hai sir.
Executive: Kya de rahe hain kya de rahe hain nahi malum kaise kar rahe hain mere ko duniya se kya karna hai ek baat bataiye.
Executive: Sir duniya se nahi hum log aap hum log aapko reference de rahe hain sir they are also getting business from IndiaMART ab woh bahut lambe time se jude hue hain sir toh aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Sir bilkul.
Customer: Char saal se juda hun toh char saal se main IndiaMART ko paisa bhi de raha hun lekin mere ko is plan ke liye specially commitment kiya gaya tha ki aapka agar aaj 2 crore ka sale hai toh sir woh 4 5 ke saath pahunch jayega.
Customer: Toh mujhe toh nahi lag raha hai ki 4 5 chhodo woh do bhi cross kar payega.
Executive: Sir char char panch sir dekho maturity aapko aa rahi hai nahi aa rahi hai woh woh sir IndiaMART na toh check kar sakta hai na commit karta hai sir.
Customer: Aapka kehna yeh hai aapko plant se baat karna nahi aa raha hai aisa kehna cha rahe hain aap.
Executive: Maine kab bola sir.
Customer: Toh phir kya hua iska matlab main.
Executive: Maine yeh bola maine yeh bola ki maturity aa rahi hai nahi aa rahi hai woh aap jaante hain sir hum toh jaante bhi nahi hai pehli cheez dusri cheez hum commit bhi nahi karte hain ki maturity aapko dilayenge ya nahi dilayenge.
Executive: Hamara ROI hai sir aap tak buyer aapki jagah aap galat hain mera Ranjit ji ki recording bhi hai is baat ki main aapko bhej dunga Shweta mam se baat hui thi main commitment karta hun definitely aapko achha main business nikal ke denge aur aap unse jude hue hain theek hai main Ranjit se aapki baat kara deta hun.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi aap rukiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Client wants to talk to Ranjit Sir.

- Wants ₹4.5 bottle, which is not manufacturing price.

- Has not received business from IndiaMART.

- Wants to talk to Ranjit Sir again.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect with Ranjit Sir.

- Executive explained ROI and marketplace role.

- Executive mentioned others getting business from IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will validate the data sent.

- Executive will connect with Pravesh once free.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, pricing, commitment, support
